abstract: Jeff Zucker announces that he will leave NBC Universal once the deal with Comcast is completed.
snippet: Jeff Zucker announces that he will leave NBC Universal once the deal with Comcast is completed.
lead_paragraph: Jeff Zucker, the chief executive of NBC Universal, told the company’s employees in an e-mail Friday morning that he would step down from his position upon the completion of the takeover of NBC by Comcast.
